ygData.subject: Re: Clarity
ygData.msgSnippet: Funny.....I think you re one of the finest bard/tanks I ve ever had the pleasure of grouping with.  :-) Wyldfox Reven tsol Xegonian Mage ... From: Blitz Krieg
ygData.messageBody:
Funny.....I think you're one of the finest bard/tanks I've ever had the
pleasure of grouping with. :-)

Wyldfox Reven'tsol
Xegonian Mage


----- Original Message -----
From: Blitz Krieg <blitz_krieg@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, November 17, 1999 7:34 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Clarity


> From: "Blitz Krieg" <blitz_krieg@...>
>
> I do find myself in 5 casters 1 Bard party's more than I care to think
about
> and they all can't wait for me to hit 32. (I hit 29 twice last night :)
I
> have too many friends who are wizards and mages and not enuf
tanks/healers.
> The last several levels I have become all too aware of the importance of a
> good tank in the party AND I KNOW that it's NOT me. : )
>
> Darkfox Reven'tsol
> Xegony
>
>
> > Just for the fun of it, has anyone tried a 5 bard, 1 wizard
> > party (all the
> > bards singing clarity)? It would be interesting to see just
> > how much mana
> > the wiz could cruise through.
> >
> > Desmei Sightblinder
> > Lvl 32 Bard [Povar]
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
